alert.note: Alert for Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 2:14PM CDT until May 07 at 7:18AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tulsa OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kiamichi River near Antlers. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, minor flooding occurs along the west bank of the Kiamichi River near Moyers. Campers should move to higher ground. At 29.0 feet, moderate flooding occurs along the west bank of the Kiamichi River near Moyers. Some permanent buildings on the campgrounds become isolated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will continue to fall through the evening but will start to rise again overnight. The river is then expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 28.4 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
